name: Lonely Night At Scratch
description:
STORY:

Stay behind and make sure the abandoned animatronics at scratch's facility aren't haunted, open and close the metal doors to defend yourself. Be sure you don't run out of power though!

CREDITS:

Credit goes to the original creators of Five Night's At Freddys and Five Nights At Treasure Island.

This project took me hours to create, hopefully you enjoy.
